content: crochet something beautiful and functional for your kitchen the granny diamond potholder this potholder is a two-striped granny square that when folded makes a diamond pattern unlike traditional granny squares that use the double_crochet and have large gaps between each cluster this pattern uses half_double_crochet stitches and only a couple of chain-sps to create a tighter/less hole-y square there is also an easy colour changing technique that will help you minimize the number of ends to weave in yay i hope you have fun making and using your potholder s > this potholder pattern is the 11th pattern in the 2023 pot holders galore crochet-along 1 with the purchase of an ebook you will receive a total of 12 +1 bonus potholder patterns one pattern every month during the crochet-along in december you ll receive the final potholder along with the bonus pattern > the free pattern for the granny diamond potholder can be found ** here 2 ** > the complete video tutorial can be found ** here 3 ** > you can learn more about the pot holders galore crochet along ** here 4 ** skill level advanced beginner language english crochet terminology us terms size this potholder measures 8 wide x 8 long but instructions are provided to customize the size of your potholder > materials * 4 0mm crochet hook needed * 220 yds / 201 m of any medium 4 worsted weight cotton yarn * scissors * yarn needle * 2 stitch markers or safety pins 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pot-holders-galore-crochet-along-2023 2 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-a-two-striped-granny-diamond-potholder/ 3 https //www youtube com/watch v=a63ddwo4s2o 4 https //thispixiecreates com/pot-holders-galore-crochet-along-2023-main-page/
